detaileddescription.para: TradingStock.cpp Implementation of TradingStock.h

Created by Salil Maharjan on 05/03/20. Copyright Â© 2020 Salil Maharjan. All rights reserved. TradingStock::TradingStock Class parameterized constructor to create a trading stock object.

string Trading stock's ticker name.
a_startingCapital
double Initial capital to invest for the stock.

memberdef.name: OpenPosition

briefdescription.para: Method to open a position for the trading stock.

detaileddescription.para:
TradingStock::OpenPosition Open a new position for the trading stock.
a_date
DateTime* Today's date.
a_signal
double Current day's signal.
a_share

a_price
double Price of shares at the time of opening.

memberdef.argsstring: (DateTime *a_date, double a_signal, double a_price, double &a_investedCaptial, double &a_numOfShares)
memberdef.name: CloseLongPositions

briefdescription.para: Method to close all long positions.

detaileddescription.para:
TradingStock::CloseLongPositions Method to close profiting long positions. Returns profit/loss generated from closing long positions. Updates invested capital in closing long positions and number of long positions that are variables passed by reference.
a_date
DateTime* Today's date.
a_signal
double Current day's signal.
a_price
double Price of shares at the time of closing.
a_investedCaptial
double& Invested capital placeholder to return the invested capital in long positions.
a_numOfShares
double& Placeholder to return number of shares in long position that were closed.
double Profit or loss generated from closing long positions.
Salil Maharjan
5/14/20.

memberdef.argsstring: (DateTime *a_date, double a_signal, double a_price, double &a_investedCaptial, double &a_numOfShares)
memberdef.name: CloseShortPositions

briefdescription.para: Method to close all short positions.

detaileddescription.para:
TradingStock::CloseShortPositions Method to close profiting short positions. Returns profit/loss generated from closing short positions. Updates invested capital in closing short positions and number of short positions that are variables passed by reference.
a_date
DateTime* Today's date.
a_signal
double Current day's signal.
a_price
double Price of shares at the time of closing.
a_investedCaptial
double& Invested capital placeholder to return the invested capital in long positions.
a_numOfShares
double& Placeholder to return number of shares in long position that were closed.
double Profit or loss generated from closing long positions.
Salil Maharjan
5/14/20.

TradingStock.h Class that handles the investment portfolio of a trading stock in the simulator. Handles trading details for each ticker used in the simulator.
